Summary

This page is written in Jekyll and hosted on GitHub (Free!). The goal of this site is to document what I've learned through my journal as a Software Engineer. You may find different topics on FrontEnd and BackEnd. However, these are not explicit examples.

There aren't many topics right now as I just started. Feel free to browse around!
